title: Understanding accessibility evaluations and testing results
description: Analyse your data and identify where you need to focus your attention for accessibility. In this course we will take you through the principles and methods used to measure accessibility compliance to the Web Content Accessibility Standards. We will look at some tools that can be used for automated checks and other approaches for validating accessibility conformance.
topics: Comparing outputs of automated testing tools to manual approaches
Factors that influence the prioritisation of accessibility issues
other_accessibility_support: A captioned recording with transcript will be shared with attendees after the live event
cost: Free or reduced fee for some
